amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for salaries and expenses for Courts of Appeals, District Courts, and Other Judicial Services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the salaries and expenses of the Courts of Appeals, District Courts, and other Judicial services by $6.9 million and reduce funding for the General Services Adminstration by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Herseth amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 232 (Roll no. 342).
